body.p:
Ano 24
Lebanon Octr 18/1863
Govr T. E. Bramlette
Dear sir W. J. Lisle refuses to accept the position of Lieut Col of Militia --
Please send a commission to F. B. Merrimee immediately -- Will have the regiment organized this week --

Marion
Marion Co,,y Oct 18/63
J R Thomas
W J Lisle declines Lt Coly of this Co,,y & F B Merrimee appointed instead
Recd I. G. O. Oct 20. 1863

write and ask Merrimee's name in full -- Tell Thomas to have Lisle write us declining his appt.
Boyle
